text:
The Swan is the largest [[skycoach]] company in [[Sharn]], with about 260 coaches in operation—over a third of the skycoaches in the City of Towers. The company is based in [[Dura]] and owned by the Undalon, a family of [[Brelish|Breland]] [[dwarves|dwarf]] with long ties to the [[Boromar Clan]]. Swan coaches aren’t always pretty, but they’re ubiquitous and they’ll take you anywhere you want to go, no questions asked. See the <<navAndScrollToHeader "Wards of Sharn" "Travel Time">> section of [[Wards of Sharn]] for a breakdown of travel costs.

[[Andala Undalon]] runs the daily operations of the Swan.
title: Swan
